unit.data.battlehammer.name: Battlehammer
unit.data.battlehammer.lore: Battlehammer is the name of the clan of reputable <style="value">Dwarven Warriors</style> that came down the Mountains to participate in the fight against the creatures that invaded the Kingdoms disturbing the peace (and trading routes).
unit.data.battlehammer.description.visua: Gruffy looking dwarf. Wearing a green cape covering the top half of his face and shoulders. Long orange beard. Carrying a large wooden shield, almost as big as him, and a long and heavy battle hammer adorned with a silver lion head.
